entry.title: Ordinals BIP PR
entry.summary: The email received discusses the topic of Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs). The sender mentions that BIPs such as increasing block size, drive-chains, and colored coins were proposals aimed at improving Bitcoin. However, the sender states that the recipient's BIP does not bring any improvement and is considered a regression. The sender urges the recipient to retract their proposal or, if they still desire to negatively affect the chain, to create Other Improvement Proposals (OIPs) or similar alternatives. The sender emphasizes the importance of focusing on the development of Bitcoin and real BIPs that actually improve it. The email is signed by Léo Haf.
